data.question: What is the role of C2H4 in the chemical industry?
data.answer: C2H4 plays an essential role in the chemical industry as an important raw material to produce polyethylene, polyvinyl chloride, synthetic rubber, and other organic chemical products.

data.question: Why is the separation of C2H4 from C2H6 challenging?
data.answer: The separation of C2H4 from C2H6 is challenging due to their very similar physico-chemical properties and molecular size.

data.question: What unique feature does FJI-H11-Me(des) have for gas adsorption?
data.answer: FJI-H11-Me(des) features one-dimensional hexagonal nonpolar pore surfaces constructed by aromatic rings and alkyl groups, which adsorbs C2H6 rather than C2H4.

data.question: Can FJI-H11-Me(des) achieve polymer-grade C2H4 purity in one-step?
data.answer: Yes, FJI-H11-Me(des) can achieve polymer-grade, 99.95% pure C2H4 in one-step from C2H4 containing 1% C2H6 under various conditions.

data.question: Is the adsorption selectivity of C2H6/C2H4 for FJI-H11-Me(des) higher than that of other MOFs?
data.answer: Yes, the adsorption selectivity of C2H6/C2H4 for FJI-H11-Me(des) is 2.09, which is larger than that of other developed MOF materials.

data.question: Does FJI-H11-Me(des) maintain its separation performance under different conditions?
data.answer: Yes, FJI-H11-Me(des) retains its excellent separation performance under various conditions including different gas flow rates, temperatures, and relative humidity.

data.question: Is the separation performance of FJI-H11-Me(des) affected by humidity?
data.answer: No, the separation performance of FJI-H11-Me(des) showed no obvious change in the range of 33â€“100% RH, indicating humidity has no obvious effect on its performance.

data.question: Does FJI-H11-Me(des) preferentially adsorb C2H4 over C2H6?
data.answer: False, FJI-H11-Me(des) preferentially adsorbs C2H6 over C2H4.

data.question: Is the adsorption capacity of FJI-H11-Me(des) for C2H6 higher than for C2H4?
data.answer: True, the C2H6 adsorption capacity of FJI-H11-Me(des) is much higher than that of C2H4 at the same temperature.

data.question: Can FJI-H11-Me(des) directly yield polymer-grade C2H4 gas from C2H6/C2H4 mixtures?
data.answer: True, FJI-H11-Me(des) can directly yield polymer-grade C2H4 gas from C2H6/C2H4 mixtures containing 1% C2H6.

data.question: Does FJI-H11-Me(des) require an additional desorption process to release C2H4 gas?
data.answer: False, FJI-H11-Me(des) does not require an additional desorption process to release C2H4 gas.

data.question: Is the worldwide energy consumption of the cryogenic distillation process for C2H4/C2H6 separation more than 0.3% of annual global energy consumption?
data.answer: True, the worldwide energy consumption of this process is about 800 PJ per year, which is more than 0.3% of annual global energy consumption.

data.question: Does FJI-H11-Me(des) have a flexible framework?
data.answer: True, FJI-H11-Me(des) has a flexible framework that contracts gradually with the loss of solvent molecules.

data.question: What is the global production capacity of ethylene expected to be in 2023?
data.answer: The global production capacity of ethylene is expected to be more than 200 million tons in 2023.

data.question: What is the main method used in industry to produce ethylene?
data.answer: The main method used in industry to produce ethylene is steam cracking or thermal decomposition of ethane (C2H6).

data.question: What is the maximum uptake for C2H6 by FJI-H11-Me(des) at 298 K?
data.answer: The maximum uptake for C2H6 by FJI-H11-Me(des) at 298 K is 57.97 cm3 g-1.

data.question: Does FJI-H11-Me(des) show a decrease in C2H4 and C2H6 uptakes after three adsorption-desorption cycles?
data.answer: No, there is no obvious decrease in C2H4 and C2H6 uptakes after three adsorption-desorption cycles.

data.question: Is the heat of adsorption (Qst) for C2H6 on FJI-H11-Me(des) higher than that for C2H4?
data.answer: Yes, the heat of adsorption (Qst) for C2H6 on FJI-H11-Me(des) is higher than that for C2H4.

data.question: Does FJI-H11-Me(des) have high moisture stability?
data.answer: Yes, FJI-H11-Me(des) has high moisture stability, as indicated by adsorption tests after exposure to the atmosphere.

data.question: Are the CuII ions in FJI-H11-Me(des) accessible to guest molecules?
data.answer: No, the CuII ions in FJI-H11-Me(des) are shielded by the aromatic rings and have no access to guest molecules.
